content.prompt: Given an array of ints and two ints n and m, return true if nand m occur next to each ohter (in any order) in the array.For example:containsNM({1,2,3}, 2, 3) => truecontainsNM({1,2,3}, 3, 4) => falsecontainsNM({7, 8, 3}, 3, 8) => truecontainsNM({}, 7, 3) => false
